name: Frostveil
movement: 15 ft. walking speed, 10 ft. flying speed
description: The Frostveil is a medium-sized, frost-covered plant creature that thrives in cold environments. Its flexible form allows it to move both on land and in the air, camouflaging itself among icy landscapes.
memorable: The Frostveil can engulf opponents while absorbing damage taken by itself, causing havoc with its freezing tendrils and incapacitating spores.
goals: Typically lurking in icy environments, the Frostveil aims to ambush unsuspecting creatures and absorb their damage while incapacitating them.
relations: The creature may be found near other cold-adapted plants and animals in frigid regions.
environment: Cold environments, like icy caves or snowy forests.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity, making it formidable in combat and providing excellent grappling abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has low Intelligence and Charisma.
attacks: Uses Frozen Tendril attacks to grapple and engulf opponents, dealing bludgeoning and cold damage, while potentially blinding them.
most_powerful_ability: Spirit Spores release to incapacitate nearby foes, dealing cold damage and causing chaos in battle.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in complete darkness.
skills: Has proficient stealth capabilities, allowing it to hide effectively in cold or icy environments.
additional_information: Immunity to cold damage and condition immunities to blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, and prone.
Chilling Acidic Body punishes attackers with acid damage on contact.
Can increase flying speed in windy conditions.
False Appearance allows it to remain undetected while motionless.
Damage Transfer ability reduces damage taken while engulfing a creature.
test_queries: creature with cold and acid damage abilities
engulfing plant monster living in snow
stealthy ice creature that grapples foes
